display_long_description:
Get ready to experience high-speed racing like never before in Thrust Hunter, an adrenaline-fueled VR racing game designed exclusively for Meta VR headsets! Take control of four uniquely designed high-performance cars and dominate four thrilling tracks, each packed with sharp turns, high-speed straights, and dynamic environments.

Race against intelligent AI opponents in a competitive battle for the podium. Whether you're tearing through checkpoint challenges or pushing the limits in intense lap-based races, every moment in Thrust Hunter is designed to test your reflexes and racing skills in a fully immersive VR world.

Feel the rush, embrace the speed, and become the ultimate Thrust Hunter!

Key Features:
🏎️ 4 high-speed cars with unique handling and performance.
🏁 4 dynamic tracks, each offering a new racing challenge.
🧠 Smart AI opponents that adapt to your driving style.
🔄 Lap & checkpoint-based races for varied gameplay modes.
🎮 Full VR immersion, putting you right in the driver’s seat.

Strap in, hit the throttle, and hunt for victory in Thrust Hunter, coming soon to the Meta Store! 🚀🔥
